version_description:
• Tweaked balancing for better gameplay.
• New Mailbox for messaging.
• New Victory and Rewards screen.
• General improvements and bug fixes.

• Events are in! Stay tuned for the new Kill All Zombies event. Play for additional rewards!
• In-game haptic feedback support. Feel the rumble on your iPhone 7 as you mow down zombies from your gunship!
• We're listening to your feedback: new balancing for battle and weapon unlocks.
• General improvements and bug fixes.

• Weapon Rarities! You can now find Common, Uncommon, Rare, Epic and Legendary weapons.
• Weapon Parts! Open Crates and and scrap weapons to earn Weapon Parts. Use Weapon Parts and Metal to boost your arsenal.
• New Workshop screen! A much better view of your weapon collection. Boosting, fusing and comparing weapons is a lot easier.
• Several audio effects and new music tracks have been added.
• Lots of polish, balancing improvements and bug fixes!
We are celebrating the global release of Zombie Gunship Survival. A huge thank you to all of you who have supported us! We’d love to hear your feedback, and please stay tuned for future updates!

We are implementing new content and major improvements:

New game mode: Frenzy. Fight endless waves of zombies for increasing rewards
90mm, 100mm and 105mm Heavy Cannons
New campaign "Sierra Township" with 10 scenarios
Five new types of crates
New Live Events: Loot and Boost

We're also changing how the cost of boosting weapons is calculated. The cost of boosting is now based on the rarity of the weapon and not its star rating anymore.

- New AIMO gunship sniper with rapid fire, quick reload time and a mag of 10 shots. Rewarded in our upcoming events.
- Fixed the achievements for the M1014 Tactical Shotgun
- Updated the spawn placement of “The Big Bet” scenario in the Deadeye Descent campaign
- Fixed several inconsistencies in the SMAW & MS Sniper Rifle achievements
- Various visual improvements to the in-game Shop and Special Offers
Various improvements, polishing and bug fixing.

* New Weapon Inventory space management: get up to 250 inventory slots by upgrading your Armory building to level 8.
* Several objectives are now achievable:
** Adjusted “Kill 5000 Zombies” to “Kill 1000 Zombies”
** Adjusted “Kill 7000 Zombies” to “Kill 2000 Zombies”
** Adjusted “Kill 10000 Zombies” to “Kill 3000 Zombies”
** Fixed “Fuse 5 Times”
* Better surfacing of the zombie health

• New “Deadeye Descent” campaign now available! Face the Heavy Titan!
• New “Heavy Titan” threat that will challenge players to adapt their tactics & loadouts to ensure the survival of their ground troops in the new Deadeye Descent campaign.
Various improvements, polishing and bug fixing.
Various improvements, polishing and bug fixing.

Survivors, get ready for the 2-year anniversary celebrations!

New Gunship Weapon: 100mm Heavy Cannon – coming (very) soon!
– Obliterate crowds with this high damage, wide radius howitzer
– Win it in upcoming events!

Anniversary Celebrations!
– New and more frequent events, including Double XP, Double Rewards and Fast Crate Unlock!
– Special anniversary gifts and offers!

ZGS <3 Community
– 90mm Heavy Cannon added to all crates
– Objectives and No Fear completion fix

Various improvements, polishing and bug fixing.
Various improvements, polishing and bug fixing.

* New Weapon Inventory space management: get up to 250 inventory slots by upgrading your Armory building to level 8.
* Several objectives are now achievable:
** Adjusted “Kill 5000 Zombies” to “Kill 1000 Zombies”
** Adjusted “Kill 7000 Zombies” to “Kill 2000 Zombies”
** Adjusted “Kill 10000 Zombies” to “Kill 3000 Zombies”
** Fixed “Fuse 5 Times”
* Better surfacing of the zombie health
Various improvements, polishing and bug fixing.
Various improvements, polishing and bug fixing.
Various improvements, polishing and bug fixing.

• New “Deadeye Descent” campaign now available! Face the Heavy Titan!
• New “Heavy Titan” threat that will challenge players to adapt their tactics & loadouts to ensure the survival of their ground troops in the new Deadeye Descent campaign.

-Chapter 2 of Deadeye Descent campaign released, adding 5 new scenarios
-New Deadeye Descent campaign side scenario dedicated to our fallen community comrade Tsar88
-Balancing pass done to existing scenarios from Deadeye Descent campaign - Chapter 1
-New Troop Weapon: AR-15 semi-automatic assault rifle rewarded from events
-100mm Heavy Cannon added to all crates

-Complete revamp of the technical and visual aspects of the in-game Shop
-Fixed the language display issue some players experienced in the community hub
-Halloween celebration with special events
-New Gunship Weapon: 105mm Heavy Cannon rewarded from events
-AR-15 semi-automatic assault rifle added to regular crates
-AR-15 is now listed in the player progression screen
-Updated the requirements to unlock & drop the AR-15 to Rank 20
-Updated the requirements to complete AR-15 related achievements to Rank 20
-Fixed the “zombie trap” exploit in Frenzy & Defense modes

Released two brand new weapons which will be rewarded in our upcoming events:
-M1014 Tactical Shotgun
-GBU-39/B Small Diameter Bomb
Improved the visual effects of the Demolition class weapons
105mm Heavy Cannon added to regular crates
Updated the requirements to unlock/drop the 105mm Heavy Cannon and complete its achievements to Rank 30
Improved visual notifications on the Shop icon for Special Offers and Ads

- New AIMO gunship sniper with rapid fire, quick reload time and a mag of 10 shots. Rewarded in our upcoming events.
- Fixed the achievements for the M1014 Tactical Shotgun
- Updated the spawn placement of “The Big Bet” scenario in the Deadeye Descent campaign
- Fixed several inconsistencies in the SMAW & MS Sniper Rifle achievements
- Various visual improvements to the in-game Shop and Special Offers

-Combined the Metal and Supply Ad rewards into a single reward type containing Metal, Supplies and Bolts.
-New Assault troop weapon: QBZ-95 assault rifle. Rewarded in our future events.
-GBU-39/B, M1014 and AIMO Gunship Sniper added to the general crates
-Fixed audio issues experienced when opening the in-game forum

●NEW DEMO WEAPON: M79 Grenade Launcher! Rewarded in our future events.
●Quality of life improvement: added an option to hide / display Full Metal & Supply Storage pop-up messages
●Heavy Cannons and Missiles deal more damage against zombies
●Slight changes to the Griffin, Hellfire and GBU-39/B blast radius
●Increased the damage & loot bonus of the QBZ-95
●Fixed an issue that caused the game to crash on some iPad devices

● NEW MARKSMAN WEAPON: SVD-63 automatic sniper rifle
● Various weapon balancing changes:
● HCAN 105 reload speed increased
● HCAN 105 clip size increased
● HCAN 90 now available from rank 24
● M-79, QBZ-95, AK-47 and M-82 stats buffed
● General Shop optimization

NEW AUTO CANNON WEAPON: AC-27mm
New crate speed up Ad reward available from the Armory
Various bug fixes

* NEW TROOP WEAPON: Saiga-12K
* Improved the descriptions of the Shop bundles & special offers
* Replaced the feedback pop-up message by the native iOS review request system
* Shop pop-up offer should now appear only once a day
* Fixed the button of the crate speed up Ad button
* Fixed several texts & descriptions

- NEW TROOP WEAPON: FMS-G2 assault rifle
- New 24 hours weapon crate Ad Reward
- Fixed an issue causing the game to load indefinitely after exiting the Shop
- Fixed various display issues with texts in multiple languages
- Fixed a couple of objectives not unlocking properly
- Lowered the rank requirement to unlock the AK-47 assault rifle

* Revamped the Objectives screen; now includes Events
* Changed how you receive rewards from Events and Completed Objectives; The new
User Experience should be more streamlined than before.
* Active Double XP, 1.5x Resources and Crate Opening Speed Up boosters are now
visible in the Events tab
* Fixed several server issues that caused connectivity problems
* Fixed several objectives not unlocking properly
* Implemented a set reset time for the 24h Ad Reward

* M32 MGL (Grenade Launcher) added to the game
* 7 Day Login Reward added
* Improved Big Bet difficulty curve
* Added 16 New Reward Crates for Special Events & Bundles
* Added an inventory counter
Miscellaneous:
* Updated several SDK versions
* Fixed an issue that caused Objective progress not to be registered

*Added NEW weapon: KH-29 missile
*Reduced spawning intensity (easy difficulty) for: The Big Bet, Aftermath, Tsar’s Rest, The Dive Two
*Expired event cards now remain for 2 days (if there are rewards to claim)
*Changed how cards are ordered in objective system
*Heavy Cannon 100 unlocks at rank 28
*Removed MP5 and G36 assault weapons from some crates
*Added SVD-63 and AC-27 to standard crates

*Added a rotating pool of daily objectives
*Added functionality for Map, Difficulty and Campaign objectives
*Added new crate models that better represent the contents of campaign rewards and bundles
*Added the WA2000 Marksman Rifle to the game

*Fixed multiple server issues
*Fixed timer on Aftermath map

- We took time in this build to fix multiple issues in our backlog
- Optimized various APIs for improved performance and security
- Added new Daily Objectives into the objective buckets
- Frenzy timer is now set to reset daily at the same hour
- Fixed an issue with the Objective delivery system
- Fixed an issue where the initial screen was being displayed in English when the device was set to Portuguese

*Added the M777 Repeating Heavy Cannon (RHC M777) to the game
*Additional functionalities for the RHC M777 reload and power ratings
*Additional functionalities for the upcoming Halloween Event
We are currently hard at work developing a major feature for the game that addresses a series of issues and improvements that have been long requested by the community. Our aim is to bring you the best experience possible with ZGS over the coming year.

*Added Gryazev-Shipunov Gryazev-Shipunov GSh-23L (GSh-23L) Autocannon for end of year events
*Added the Napalm Howitzer to the game
*Napalm Howitzer is the first utility weapon type implemented. Firing it behaves very similar to a cannon - it shoots a projectile that explodes on impact spreading fire and destruction on the battlefield. Enemies that walk through the fire are slowed and have a damage over time effect applied to them.

Season’s greeting Airmen! New Redesigned Map Screen! New Campaign!

*New Redesigned Map Screen: We’ve centralised all game modes in one sleek location, quick access to your armory and special events. Expect new maps, zombies and weapons more frequently!
*New Campaign ‘Fire Peaks’: 4 NEW missions are available to play now
*Reduced difficulty on ('Easy' difficulty only): The Dive, Operation Crow, Grief, The Big Bet, Aftermath, The Dive Two

Season’s greeting Airmen! New Redesigned Map Screen! New Campaign!

*New Redesigned Map Screen: We’ve centralised all game modes in one sleek location, quick access to your armory and special events. Expect new maps, zombies and weapons more frequently!
*New Campaign ‘Fire Peaks’: 4 NEW missions are available to play now
*Reduced difficulty on ('Easy' difficulty only): The Dive, Operation Crow, Grief, The Big Bet, Aftermath, The Dive Two

New Year’s greetings, Airmen! New Maps! New Weapon!

*New Maps: 3 NEW missions are available to play now on Fire Peaks
*New Weapon: SM16 is the new addition to your troop’s weapon rack
*Fixed minor bugs

"Greetings, Airmen! New Maps! New Enemy!

*New Maps: 3 NEW missions are available to play now on Fire Peaks
*New Enemy: the Wrecker is here and ready to spread mayhem
*Fixed minor bugs"

Salute, Airmen! New Weapon! New Campaign - New Maps!
*New Weapon: The SLT S181K Gunship Sniper is now ready and steady
*New Campaign and Maps: 4 new maps are available on the new Wasteland campaign
*Wrecker animation tweaks
*Fixed minor bugs

Salute, Airmen! New Challenges: New Scenarios!
*New Scenarios: 3 new maps are available on the Wasteland campaign
*Minor UI Tweaks
*Fixed minor bugs

Greetings, Airmen! The end of the Wasteland saga is here.
*New Scenarios: Last 3 levels of Wasteland
*New Weapon: MK77 Firebomb
*Minor Bug Fixes

Salute, Airmen! A new territory has been reached!
*New Campaign: “Ruined Hamlet” is now available
*New Levels: 2 new scenarios are available in the newly added campaign
*Minor Bug Fixes

Greetings, Airmen! Our newest update is here!
*New Scenarios: Two new levels in the Ruined Hamlet campaign
*New Weapon: New troop MG the M60E6
New zombie abilities and map assets are under development - coming soon! Thank you for your continued support!

Greetings, Airmen! New challenges ahead!
*New Scenarios: 3 new zombie infested maps
*Minor Bug Fixes

We’re also working on new zombie abilities and map assets, coming soon! Thank you for your continued support!
